ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rabbit: Doux, calme, élégant et alerte ; rapide et habile.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dragon: Confiant, intelligent, enthousiaste et un leader né.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Horse: Vif, actif, énergique et aime être dans la foule.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Goat: Doux, timide, stable, sympathique et amical.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rooste: Observateur, travailleur, ingénieux, courageux et talentueux.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dog: Loyal, honnête, aimable, gentil, prudent et prévoyant.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Pig: Diligent, compatissant, généreux et facile à vivre.
MayanHoroscopePage.title: Maya-Horoskop
MayanHoroscopePage.subtitle: Entdecken Sie die alten Erkenntnisse der Maya-Astrologie.
MayanHoroscopePage.comingSoon: Weitere Maya-Werkzeuge und Berechnungen folgen in Kürze!
MayanHoroscopePage.question: Wesentliche Frage:
MayanHoroscopePage.kinCalculatorDescript: Der Maya-Kin ist eine Einheit von Zeit und Energie im Tzolkin (heiliger Maya-Kalender). Er repräsentiert Ihre persönliche galaktische Signatur, die die Energie eines Sonnensiegels und eines Galaktischen Tons kombiniert und Einblicke in Ihren Zweck und Lebensweg bietet.
MayanHoroscopePage.selectDatePrompt: Wählen Sie Ihr Geburtsdatum, um Ihr Maya-Kin zu entdecken.
MayanHoroscopePage.errorCalculatingKin: Fehler bei der Berechnung Ihres Kin. Bitte überprüfen Sie das Datum und versuchen Sie es erneut.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep1: Basisdatum: Der 26. Juli 1987 (Kin 1: 1 Imix - Magnetischer Drache) dient als Ausgangspunkt in der Dreamspell-Zählung.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep2: Verstrichene Tage: Wir berechnen die Gesamtzahl der Tage zwischen dem Basisdatum und Ihrem Geburtsdatum.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep3: Kin-Nummer: Mit Modulo 260 (Gesamtzahl der Kine im Tzolkin) erhalten wir Ihre Kin-Nummer (1-260). Vereinfachte Formel: Kin = ((TageSeitBasis + BasisKin - 1) % 260 + 260) % 260 + 1.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep4: Sonnensiegel (Nahual): Abgeleitet von der Kin-Nummer mit Modulo 20: (Kin - 1) % 20.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep5: Galaktischer Ton: Abgeleitet von der Kin-Nummer mit Modulo 13: (Kin - 1) % 13.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainNote: Dies ist eine moderne Interpretation (Dreamspell) des Maya-Tzolkin. Es existieren andere traditionelle Zählweisen.

GalacticTone.Magnetic.name: Magnetisch
GalacticTone.Magnetic.question: Was ist mein Ziel?
GalacticTone.Magnetic.interpretation: Der magnetische Ton ist der Anfang, der das Ziel anzieht. Er vereint alle Teile deines Seins, um sich auf ein klares Ziel zu konzentrieren. Frage dich heute: Was ist meine wahre Absicht? Was möchte ich in mein Leben ziehen?
GalacticTone.Lunar.name: Lunar
GalacticTone.Lunar.question: Was sind meine Herausforderungen?
GalacticTone.Lunar.interpretation: Der lunare Ton offenbart Dualität und Herausforderungen. Er hilft dir, die Hindernisse zu erkennen, die du überwinden musst, um dein Ziel zu erreichen. Reflektiere heute: Welche Polaritäten gibt es in meiner Situation? Welche Herausforderungen stärken mich?
GalacticTone.Electric.name: Elektrisch
GalacticTone.Electric.question: Wie kann ich am besten dienen?
GalacticTone.Electric.interpretation: Der elektrische Ton aktiviert den Dienst. Es ist Energie in Bewegung, der Funke, der die Aktion entzündet. Er fragt dich, wie du deine Talente in den Dienst eines größeren Zwecks stellen kannst. Überlege heute: Wie kann ich meine Ressourcen aktivieren? Inwiefern nützt mein Dienst anderen?
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.name: Selbst-Existent
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.question: Was ist die Form der Handlung?
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.interpretation: Der selbst-existente Ton definiert die Form der Handlung. Er gibt deinem Zweck Struktur und Maß. Er hilft dir, die Grundlagen zu schaffen und zu verstehen, wie du deine Ideen manifestieren kannst. Denke heute: Was ist die effektivste Form für mein Handeln? Welche Muster und Maßnahmen muss ich etablieren?
GalacticTone.Overtone.name: Oberton
GalacticTone.Overtone.question: Wie kann ich mich ermächtigen?
GalacticTone.Overtone.interpretation: Der Oberton befiehlt Ausstrahlung und innere Kraft. Er sammelt Ressourcen und gibt dir die Autorität zu glänzen. Konzentriere dich heute darauf: Wie kann ich meine Kräfte und Ressourcen sammeln? Auf welche Weise strahle ich meine persönliche Kraft aus?
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.name: Rhythmisch
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.question: Wie organisiere ich mich für Gleichheit?
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.interpretation: Der rhythmische Ton organisiert für Gleichheit und Gleichgewicht. Er hilft dir, das Gleichgewicht im Fluss des Lebens zu finden und Herausforderungen organisch zu bewältigen. Suche heute: Wie kann ich mein Leben und meine Handlungen ausbalancieren? Wie organisiere ich meine Umgebung für Harmonie?
GalacticTone.Resonant.name: Resonant
GalacticTone.Resonant.question: Wie stimme ich meinen Dienst auf andere ab?
GalacticTone.Resonant.interpretation: Der resonante Ton kanalisiert Einstimmung und Inspiration. Er verbindet dich mit der Quelle der Weisheit und ermöglicht es dir, in Harmonie mit dem Universum zu schwingen. Stimme dich heute ein: Was inspiriert mich wirklich? Wie kann ich mein Sein mit meinem höchsten Zweck in Einklang bringen?
GalacticTone.Galactic.name: Galaktisch
GalacticTone.Galactic.question: Lebe ich, was ich glaube?
GalacticTone.Galactic.interpretation: Der galaktische Ton modelliert Integrität und Harmonie. Er lädt dich ein, nach deinen Überzeugungen zu leben und kohärent zu handeln. Untersuche heute: Spiegelt mein Handeln meine Werte wider? Lebe ich in Integrität mit meiner Wahrheit?
GalacticTone.Solar.name: Solar
GalacticTone.Solar.question: Wie erreiche ich mein Ziel?
GalacticTone.Solar.interpretation: Der solare Ton pulsiert Absicht und Verwirklichung. Er gibt dir den letzten Anstoß, um dein Ziel zu manifestieren und deine Ziele zu erreichen. Frage dich heute: Wie kann ich meine Energie auf die Verwirklichung meiner Absicht lenken? Welche konkreten Schritte sollte ich unternehmen?
GalacticTone.Planetary.name: Planetarisch
GalacticTone.Planetary.question: Wie vervollkommne ich, was ich tue?
GalacticTone.Planetary.interpretation: Der planetare Ton vervollkommnet die Manifestation. Er produziert, was du beabsichtigt hast, und macht deine Vision greifbar. Konzentriere dich heute darauf: Wie kann ich meine Schöpfung verbessern und vervollkommnen? Was manifestiert sich durch mich?
GalacticTone.Spectral.name: Spektral
GalacticTone.Spectral.question: Wie lasse ich los?
GalacticTone.Spectral.interpretation: Der spektrale Ton löst auf und befreit. Er hilft dir, loszulassen, was nicht mehr dient, alte Strukturen aufzulösen und Raum für Neues zu schaffen. Überlege heute: Was muss ich in meinem Leben loslassen? Wie kann ich Fesseln und Einschränkungen loslassen?
GalacticTone.Crystal.name: Kristall
GalacticTone.Crystal.question: Wie kann ich mich der Zusammenarbeit widmen?
GalacticTone.Crystal.interpretation: Der Kristallton widmet sich der Zusammenarbeit und Universalisierung. Er lehrt dich, deine Gaben zu teilen und für ein höheres Gut zusammenzuarbeiten. Reflektiere heute: Wie kann ich mit anderen zusammenarbeiten? Inwiefern tragen meine Handlungen zur Gemeinschaft bei?
GalacticTone.Cosmic.name: Kosmisch
GalacticTone.Cosmic.question: Wie erweitere ich meine Freude und Liebe?
GalacticTone.Cosmic.interpretation: Der kosmische Ton transzendiert mit Gegenwart und Ausdauer. Es ist die Rückkehr zum Ursprung und die Erweiterung des Bewusstseins. Er lädt dich ein, vollständig in der Gegenwart zu leben und Liebe und Freude auszustrahlen. Erlebe heute: Wie kann ich präsenter sein? Wie erweitere ich meine Freude und meine Liebe ohne Grenzen?
ProfilePage.title: Benutzerprofil
ProfilePage.subtitle: Verwalte deine himmlische Identität.
ProfilePage.placeholderBio: Liebhaber der Sterne, Sucher kosmischer Weisheit. Das Universum Horoskop für Horoskop erkunden.

ProfilePage.cosmicEnergyDescription: Sammle Punkte, indem du die App nutzt.
DreamReadingPage.title: Traumdeutung
DreamReadingPage.subtitle: Entdecke die verborgenen Bedeutungen und Symbole in deinen Träumen.
DreamReadingPage.errorFetching: Die Traumlandschaft ist verschwommen... Konnte keine Deutung erhalten. Bitte versuche es erneut.
DreamWizard.step1.title: Beschreibe deinen Traum
DreamWizard.step1.description: Erzähle die Hauptgeschichte deines Traums so detailliert wie möglich.
DreamWizard.step1.placeholder: Ich war in einem dunklen Wald und fing plötzlich an, über eine Stadt aus Wolken zu fliegen...
DreamWizard.step2.title: Personen oder Wesen
DreamWizard.step2.description: Wer ist in deinem Traum erschienen? (z.B. Familie, Fremde, sprechende Tiere)
DreamWizard.step2.placeholder: Meine Mutter, ein alter Freund, ein Fuchs, der mich führte...
DreamWizard.step3.title: Orte und Szenerien
DreamWizard.step3.description: Wo hat sich der Traum abgespielt? (z.B. Elternhaus, ein unbekannter Ort, Weltraum)
DreamWizard.step3.placeholder: An einem schwarzen Sandstrand, in einem Kristallschloss...
DreamWizard.step4.title: Dominante Emotionen
DreamWizard.step4.description: Welche Emotionen hast du während des Traums am stärksten gefühlt?
DreamWizard.step4.placeholder: Freude, Angst, Verwirrung, ein Gefühl des Friedens...
DreamWizard.step5.title: Symbole und Objekte
DreamWizard.step5.description: Gab es Objekte, Farben oder Symbole, die sich wiederholten oder hervorstachen?
DreamWizard.step5.placeholder: Ein goldener Schlüssel, eine stehengebliebene Uhr, überall Wasser...
DreamWizard.step6.title: Traumintensität
DreamWizard.step6.description: Wie lebhaft oder intensiv war dein Traum?
DreamWizard.loadingMessage: Die Geister analysieren die Symbole und Emotionen deiner Reise...
DreamTrends.title: Trends in deinen Träumen
DreamTrends.description: Symbole, die diesen Monat häufig in deinen Träumen erscheinen.
DreamTrends.noTrends: Noch keine wiederkehrenden Trends. Protokolliere weiter deine Träume, um Muster aufzudecken!

Share.copiedLinkMessage: Die Offenbarung wurde in deine Zwischenablage kopiert.
Share.errorMessageClipboard: Konnte nicht kopieren. Bitte versuche es manuell zu teilen.

OnboardingPage.title: Willkommen bei AstroVibes!
OnboardingPage.subtitleStep: Schritt {currentStep} von {totalSteps}: Lass uns dich kennenlernen
OnboardingPage.step1Description: Wie sollen wir dich nennen? Dies wird dein öffentlicher Name in der App sein.
OnboardingPage.step2Description: Dies hilft uns, die Lesungen für dich zu personalisieren.
OnboardingPage.step3Description: Dein Geburtsdatum bestimmt dein Sonnenzeichen und andere astrologische Details.
OnboardingPage.step4Description: Die genaue Zeit hilft, deinen Aszendenten zu berechnen (optional).
OnboardingPage.step5Description: Deine Geburtsstadt kann Details in deiner Geburtskarte verfeinern (optional).
OnboardingPage.step6Description: Dies kann Einblicke in deine Liebeshoroskope geben.
OnboardingPage.step7Description: Dies hilft uns, deine Karriere- und Finanz-Horoskope anzupassen.
OnboardingPage.step8Description: Bitte überprüfe deine Präferenzen, um dein Profil zu vervollständigen.
OnboardingPage.nameHelper: Dies wird dein Anzeigename in der App sein.
OnboardingPage.timeOfBirthHelper: Die Kenntnis deiner Geburtszeit hilft bei genaueren astrologischen Berechnungen wie deinem Aszendenten.
OnboardingPage.cityOfBirthHelper: Deine Geburtsstadt kann auch astrologische Details verfeinern.
OnboardingPage.adsConsentDescription: Erlaube uns, deine Informationen zu verwenden, um dir relevantere Anzeigen und Inhalte zu zeigen. Du kannst dies später in den Einstellungen ändern.
OnboardingPage.reviewAndFinishPrompt: Bitte überprüfe deine Auswahl und klicke auf 'Fertigstellen', um dein Profil zu vervollständigen.
OnboardingPage.submissionSuccessMessage: Dein kosmisches Profil ist eingerichtet. Willkommen!
OnboardingPage.submissionSuccessMessageP: Dein kosmisches Profil ist eingerichtet! Bereite dich auf personalisierte Einblicke vor.
OnboardingPage.dataUsageNote: Deine Informationen helfen uns, dein astrologisches Erlebnis anzupassen. Wir respektieren deine Privatsphäre.

PsychicMatch.q1: Dans quel domaine de votre vie cherchez-vous principalement de la clarté ?

PsychicMatch.q2.opt4: Pratique et orientée vers les solutions

PsychicMatch.q3.opt2: Je dois prendre une décision importante
PsychicMatch.q3.opt3: Je cherche à tourner la page ou à guérir

PsychicMatch.errorFindingPsychic: Nous n'avons pas pu trouver de voyant pour vous pour le moment. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.
PsychicGallery.title: Voyants
PsychicGallery.findPerfectPsychicTitle: Prêt(e) à trouver le voyant parfait ?
PsychicGallery.affinityPsychicsDescripti: Voyants qui correspondent le mieux à votre profil et qui sont fortement recommandés par leurs fidèles adeptes.
PsychicGallery.mostAccurateDescription: Voyants reconnus pour leur précision exceptionnelle dans les prédictions et les conseils.
PsychicGallery.loveReadingsDescription: Spécialistes des affaires de cœur, des relations et des âmes sœurs.
PsychicPhrase.esmeralda: Votre cœur connaît le chemin ; je ne fais qu'éclairer la voie.
PsychicPhrase.zephyr: L'avenir n'est pas gravé dans la pierre, mais dans le vent. Écoutons ensemble.
PsychicPhrase.seraphina: Les étoiles murmurent des secrets à ceux qui osent écouter.
PsychicPhrase.aurora: Dans chaque aube se trouve une nouvelle réponse. Laissez-moi vous aider à la voir.
PsychicPhrase.orion: Les chiffres ne mentent pas. Ensemble, nous déchiffrerons le modèle de votre succès.
PsychicPhrase.kaelen: La paix intérieure est le vrai nord. Trouvons-la ensemble.
PsychicPhrase.isolde: Le fil rouge du destin peut s'emmêler, mais il ne se rompt jamais.
PsychicPhrase.rohan: La clarté sur vos objectifs est le premier pas vers l'abondance.
PsychicPhrase.lyra: La mélodie de votre vie est pleine de possibilités. Quelle chanson voulez-vous chanter aujourd'hui ?

ZodiacGalleryPage.title: Signes du Zodiaque
ZodiacGalleryPage.subtitle: Explorez les caractéristiques de chaque signe astrologique.

Aries.title: Traits du Bélier
Aries.description: En tant que premier signe du zodiaque, le Bélier représente l'aube, l'impulsion primale et l'étincelle qui met tout en mouvement. Gouverné par Mars, la planète de la guerre, de l'action et du désir, un Bélier est l'incarnation de l'énergie dans sa forme la plus pure et la plus directe. Ils ne connaissent pas la peur lorsqu'il s'agit de tracer de nouvelles voies ; ce sont les pionniers, les explorateurs et les guerriers qui se lancent tête baissée dans l'inconnu, souvent là où d'autres n'osent pas aller. Leur esprit est celui d'un leader né, non pas parce qu'ils cherchent des suiveurs, mais parce que leur confiance et leur foi inébranlable en eux-mêmes sont contagieuses. Ils vivent dans le moment présent, avec une urgence qui peut être à la fois inspirante et accablante. Un Bélier ne pense pas à l'échec, car pour lui, chaque tentative est une victoire en soi. Cette nature impulsive en fait des êtres incroyablement dynamiques et spontanés, toujours prêts pour la prochaine aventure. Cependant, cette même qualité peut les conduire à l'impatience et à un manque de prévoyance. Leur devise pourrait être "agir d'abord, poser des questions plus tard", ce qui leur cause des ennuis aussi souvent que cela leur ouvre des portes. Ils sont farouchement indépendants et valorisent leur autonomie par-dessus tout. Un Bélier ne demande pas la permission, il la prend, croyant fermement en son droit de forger son propre destin.
Aries.love: En amour, un Bélier est une force de la nature. Passionnés et impulsifs, ils se jettent dans la romance avec une intensité qui peut être à la fois excitante et accablante. La phase de séduction est leur champ de bataille préféré, où ils savourent l'excitation de la conquête. Ils cherchent un partenaire qui n'est pas seulement un amant, mais un compagnon d'aventure, quelqu'un prêt à faire un saut dans le vide avec eux. Leur langage d'amour est l'action : ils planifieront des escapades surprises et vous défendront avec acharnement. Cependant, leur indépendance est sacrée, et ils ne tolèrent pas la possessivité. Leur plus grand défi est la patience ; ils veulent que tout se passe maintenant, et peuvent être frustrés si le rythme de la relation est trop lent. Une fois qu'ils s'engagent vraiment, leur loyauté est inébranlable, devenant le protecteur le plus féroce de leur partenaire.
Aries.friendship: Un ami Bélier est le catalyseur de votre vie sociale, celui qui vous appelle un vendredi après-midi avec un plan fou mais irrésistible. Leur loyauté est légendaire ; ils sont du genre 'agir d'abord, poser des questions plus tard' lorsqu'il s'agit de défendre leurs amis. Une amitié avec eux est une série d'aventures inoubliables, car ils détestent la stagnation et cherchent toujours la prochaine émotion forte. Ils vous pousseront hors de votre zone de confort et vous mettront au défi de faire face à vos peurs. Cependant, leur honnêteté est si directe qu'elle peut être involontairement blessante, et leur esprit de compétition peut transformer une soirée de jeux de société en une bataille épique. Mais leur colère est de courte durée et leur générosité est sans limites, ce qui rend chaque moment de haute énergie digne d'être vécu.
Aries.work: Au travail, le Bélier est le pionnier et l'entrepreneur. Ils sont excellents pour démarrer des projets à partir de zéro, avec une énergie et un courage qui peuvent inspirer des équipes entières. Ils n'ont pas peur de prendre des risques calculés et s'épanouissent dans des environnements à haute pression où des décisions rapides sont essentielles. Cependant, ils ne sont pas les meilleurs pour la maintenance à long terme ou les tâches répétitives. La microgestion ou une bureaucratie lente peuvent les frustrer immensément. Leur plus grand défi est la persévérance ; une fois que l'excitation initiale d'un projet s'estompe, ils peuvent chercher la prochaine 'grande chose'. Ils fonctionnent mieux dans des rôles de leadership, en tant que fondateurs ou chefs de projet, où ils peuvent déléguer les détails et se concentrer sur la vision globale et la stratégie.

Taurus.title: Traits du Taureau
Taurus.description: Le Taureau, gouverné par Vénus, est l'incarnation de la force tranquille, de la persévérance et d'une connexion sensuelle avec le monde physique. En tant que signe de Terre fixe, ils sont les bâtisseurs du zodiaque, ancrés dans la réalité et dotés d'une patience quasi infinie. Leur mission est d'apporter la beauté, la stabilité et la sécurité dans le monde matériel. Un Taureau ne se précipite pas ; il se déplace avec un rythme délibéré et méthodique, évaluant soigneusement chaque étape. Pour eux, la qualité l'emporte toujours sur la quantité, que ce soit dans leurs possessions, leurs relations ou leurs projets. Ils apprécient profondément les plaisirs sensoriels : le goût d'un bon repas, la texture d'un tissu doux, le son d'une musique harmonieuse. Cette connexion avec le tangible leur donne une base solide, mais peut aussi se manifester par un entêtement légendaire. Une fois qu'un Taureau a pris une décision, il est presque impossible de le faire changer d'avis, comme essayer de déplacer une montagne. Cette détermination est leur plus grande force et, parfois, leur plus grande faiblesse. Ils sont incroyablement loyaux et fiables, le genre de personne qui construit des fondations durables dans tout ce qu'elle fait. Leur quête de sécurité n'est pas seulement matérielle, mais aussi émotionnelle, ce qui en fait des partenaires et des amis incroyablement protecteurs et constants.
Taurus.love: En tant qu'amant, le Taureau est l'incarnation de la dévotion et de la sensualité. Il aborde l'amour avec la même patience et le même soin méthodique qu'il applique à tous les domaines de sa vie, recherchant un partenaire qui lui procure un sentiment de sécurité et de stabilité inébranlables. Leurs expressions d'affection sont tangibles : ils se délectent de dorloter par le toucher, les massages, en préparant des repas somptueux ou en créant un foyer beau et confortable. Pour eux, l'amour est quelque chose que l'on construit. Le défi se pose lorsque leur besoin de sécurité se transforme en possessivité. Ils ont besoin d'un partenaire qui apprécie leur loyauté et qui peut gérer leur entêtement occasionnel avec patience.
Taurus.friendship: Un ami Taureau est celui sur qui vous pouvez toujours compter, le roc au milieu du chaos de la vie. Ils sont la définition de la loyauté et de la fiabilité, la personne que vous appelez à 2 heures du matin sans hésiter. Leurs amitiés sont basées sur le confort et les plaisirs partagés : un bon repas, une soirée tranquille avec de la musique ou simplement profiter d'une compagnie paisible. Ils offrent des conseils pratiques et terre-à-terre, et leur soutien est inébranlable. Le seul point de friction est leur entêtement. Un désaccord avec un Taureau peut ressembler à une bataille avec une force inamovible, mais leur loyauté garantit qu'ils reviennent toujours.
Taurus.work: Au travail, le Taureau est le bâtisseur constant. Ils ne sont pas intéressés par les gains rapides, mais par la construction de résultats durables et de haute qualité. Ils sont méthodiques, patients et ont une endurance incroyable pour mener à bien les projets, bien après que d'autres aient abandonné. Ils s'épanouissent dans des environnements stables et excellent dans les rôles qui nécessitent une approche pratique et un œil pour l'esthétique, comme dans la finance, l'architecture, le design ou l'agriculture. Ils sont le fondement de toute équipe, s'assurant que le travail n'est pas seulement fait, mais bien fait.

Gemini.title: Traits des Gémeaux
Gemini.description: Les Gémeaux, gouvernés par la planète Mercure, sont le papillon social et l'intellectuel du zodiaque. Ils sont naturellement curieux, adaptables et ont une soif insatiable d'information. Leur esprit est en mouvement constant, sautant d'une idée à l'autre, ce qui en fait des interlocuteurs fascinants et des apprenants à vie. Leur dualité innée, symbolisée par les Jumeaux, leur permet de voir plusieurs perspectives à la fois. Ce sont les messagers du zodiaque, créant des liens et diffusant des informations. Leur énergie est jeune, ludique et agitée, toujours à la recherche de la prochaine conversation intéressante, du prochain livre ou de la prochaine aventure. Cette quête constante de nouveauté peut aussi les faire paraître dispersés et incohérents. Ils vivent dans un monde de possibilités et ont parfois du mal à s'engager sur une seule voie, de peur de passer à côté de quelque chose d'autre.
Gemini.love: En amour, une relation avec un Gémeaux est un montagnes russes d'esprit, de charme et de gymnastique intellectuelle. Ils ont besoin d'un partenaire qui stimule leur cerveau autant que leur cœur ; la communication est pour eux la forme ultime de préliminaires. Ils sont joueurs, séducteurs et parfois insaisissables, ce qui ne vient pas d'un manque de sentiment mais d'un centre d'intérêt en perpétuel changement. Ils ont besoin de variété et de spontanéité pour ne pas s'ennuyer. Un partenaire qui respecte leur liberté et qui est prêt à explorer de nouvelles idées et de nouveaux endroits avec eux gagnera leur loyauté indéfectible et un compagnon qui les fera toujours rire.
Gemini.friendship: Un ami Gémeaux est le centre de votre réseau social. Ils connaissent tout le monde et ont toujours les dernières informations. Les amitiés avec eux sont dynamiques, amusantes et remplies de conversations stimulantes. Ils sont incroyablement adaptables et peuvent s'entendre avec presque tout le monde. Ils apprécient leur indépendance et attendent la même chose de leurs amis. Le défi est de retenir leur attention, car ils jonglent souvent avec différents cercles sociaux et intérêts. Mais lorsque vous avez besoin d'un ami pour imaginer une nouvelle idée ou simplement analyser le monde, un Gémeaux est le meilleur allié.
Gemini.work: Au travail, les Gémeaux sont des maîtres de la communication et du multitâche. Ils s'épanouissent dans des environnements dynamiques et rapides où ils peuvent utiliser leur agilité mentale pour résoudre des problèmes et générer des idées. Les rôles dans le marketing, la vente, le journalisme, l'enseignement et les relations publiques sont idéaux pour eux. Ils sont d'excellents réseauteurs et peuvent facilement établir des liens entre différents départements ou concepts. Leur plus grand défi est de se concentrer sur des tâches à long terme et axées sur les détails. Ils ont besoin d'une stimulation et d'une variété constantes pour donner le meilleur d'eux-mêmes.

Cancer.title: Traits of the Cancer
Cancer.description: Ruled by the Moon, Cancer is the deeply emotional and intuitive heart of the zodiac. They are naturally nurturing and protective of those they love, valuing home and family above all else. Their outer shell may seem tough, but inside lies immense sensitivity and a rich inner life. They have an uncanny memory, especially for emotional events. Cancers operate on a feeling level, often absorbing the atmospheres and emotions around them like a sponge. This ability makes them incredibly empathetic but also vulnerable to moodiness and being overwhelmed. They crave security and comfort, and their main mission in life is to create a safe 'home,' both physically and emotionally, for themselves and their loved ones. Loyalty is paramount to them; once you earn their trust, you have a defender for life. However, if that trust is broken, they can hold a grudge for a long time. Their cardinal nature drives them to take initiative in emotional and domestic matters, making them the pillars of their families and friend circles.
Cancer.love: In a relationship, Cancer is the archetype of the devoted caretaker. They long for a deep emotional connection and seek a partner with whom they can build a safe sanctuary, a home. Love for Cancer is synonymous with security, loyalty, and nourishment. They show their affection through acts of service, cooking for their loved one, creating a cozy space, and offering unconditional emotional support. However, their extreme sensitivity can be a challenge. They are prone to mood swings, influenced by the phases of the moon and the emotional environment. They need constant reassurance and affection to avoid retreating into their shell. Once they feel secure, their love is one of the deepest and most protective of the zodiac.
Cancer.friendship: A Cancer friend is the heart of the group, the one who turns friends into family. Their loyalty is legendary, and they will always remember the little details that matter to you. They are the ones who will cook your favorite meal when you're sad and offer a shoulder to cry on without judgment. They thrive on intimacy and prefer small, cozy gatherings to large parties. However, their sensitivity can make them easily hurt. A careless comment can cause them to withdraw into their shell for days. The key to a lasting friendship with a Cancer is patience, empathy, and constantly showing that you value their deep capacity for care.
Cancer.work: In the workplace, Cancer thrives in roles that allow them to nurture and protect, whether it's clients, colleagues, or a cause. They make excellent managers who create a family-like, supportive team environment. Fields like teaching, nursing, social work, hospitality, and human resources are ideal for them. Their intuition gives them an edge in business, as they can 'feel' the needs of the market and people. However, they need an emotionally safe work environment to perform at their best. An overly critical or competitive atmosphere can make them defensive and lose confidence, affecting their productivity.

Leo.title: Traits of the Leo
Leo.description: Ruled by the Sun, the center of our solar system, Leo is the radiant, charismatic royalty of the zodiac. Brimming with confidence, generosity, and a natural flair for the dramatic, Leo loves to be the center of attention and inspire others with their warmth and vitality. They have a big heart and an innate creativity that must be expressed. A Leo doesn't just enter a room; they conquer it. Their presence is magnetic, drawing people in with their natural charm and infectious optimism. They possess an inherent dignity and pride that, while sometimes bordering on arrogance, stems from a deep sense of self-worth. They are fiercely loyal and protective of their 'kingdom,' whether it's their family, friends, or work team. Generosity is one of their most prominent traits; a Leo enjoys showering their loved ones with gifts and affection. However, this need to be the sun around which others revolve means they crave admiration and recognition. A blow to their ego can be devastating. At their core, a Leo just wants to love and be loved, to celebrate life, and to share their light with the world.
Leo.love: Loving a Leo is like having a front-row seat to a grand performance. They are dramatic, passionate, and incredibly generous lovers. Romance for them is a theatrical production, filled with grand gestures, lavish gifts, and endless adoration. They long to be the center of their partner's universe and, in return, offer fierce loyalty and protection. They don't walk; they strut, and they expect their partner to admire their every move. The relationship must be fun, playful, and full of praise. However, their need for constant attention can be exhausting, and their bruised pride can lead to Oscar-worthy drama. They need a partner who is both their biggest fan and an equal who isn't afraid to challenge their ego with grace.
Leo.friendship: A Leo friend is the sun of your social circle. They are the ones who organize the most memorable parties and make sure everyone feels included and celebrated. Their loyalty is unwavering; they will defend their friends with the ferocity of a lion defending its cubs. They are incredibly generous, both with their time and their resources. However, a friendship with a Leo requires you to acknowledge their royalty. They love being the center of attention and expect their friends to be their most loyal audience. Though their heart is golden, their pride is fragile. If they feel ignored or unappreciated, their roar will be heard. Despite this, their warmth and zest for life make any drama worthwhile.
Leo.work: At work, Leo is the natural leader and the team's motivator. They don't necessarily seek power for its own sake, but for the opportunity to inspire and lead by example. They thrive in roles that allow them to shine, whether on stage, in the boardroom, or at the helm of a creative team. They are excellent speakers, performers, directors, and spokespeople. Their confidence is contagious, and they have an innate ability to make people believe in a vision. Their biggest challenge is delegation; they sometimes feel that no one can do the job as well (or with as much flair) as they can. They need constant recognition for their contributions and can become demotivated in an environment that doesn't value their individual sparkle.

Virgo.title: Traits of the Virgo
Virgo.description: Virgo is the sign of service, purity, and practical analysis. Ruled by Mercury, they possess a sharp mind and an innate desire to improve and organize the world around them. They are detail-oriented, methodical, and have a deep-seated need to be useful. They are the quiet helpers of the zodiac, working behind the scenes to ensure everything runs perfectly. A Virgo's mind is a complex system of lists, plans, and analysis. They notice the details that others overlook, which makes them excellent editors, critics, and artisans. This perfectionism, however, is a double-edged sword. It can lead them to relentless self-criticism and a constant anxiety about not living up to their own impossible standards. Despite their reserved nature, Virgos have a deep well of care and devotion. They show their love not with grand gestures, but with practical acts of service: fixing a leaky faucet, organizing your finances, or simply being there with sensible advice when you need it most. Their greatest challenge is learning to relax, to accept imperfection, and to understand that they are valuable for who they are, not just for what they do for others.
weaknesses: Overly critical of self and others
Virgo.love: In love, Virgo expresses their affection in the most practical and tangible ways. Their love language isn't sonnets, but acts of service: making sure you have everything you need, organizing your schedule, or preparing a healthy meal. They are cautious at first, analyzing every detail before giving their heart away. They seek a partner who is clean, intelligent, and reliable. Once they commit, they are incredibly loyal, attentive, and devoted partners. Their biggest challenge is overcoming their tendency to be critical. They can become fixated on their partner's (and their own) imperfections, forgetting that love is inherently imperfect. They need a companion who appreciates their devotion and helps them to relax and be less hard on themselves.
Virgo.friendship: A Virgo friend is the most dependable support system you can imagine. They are the ones who remember your allergies, help you assemble that complicated piece of furniture, and give you the most practical, well-researched advice. Their friendship is quiet, drama-free, and built on loyalty and mutual support. They aren't the most emotionally expressive, but their constant presence and acts of help speak louder than a thousand words. The challenge is that their desire to 'help' can sometimes turn into unsolicited criticism about how you could improve your life. If you can see past that and appreciate their pure intention, you'll have a lifelong friend who truly cares about your well-being.
Virgo.work: In the workplace, Virgo is the pillar of efficiency and quality. They are the editors, analysts, researchers, and administrators par excellence. They have an eagle eye for detail and an innate ability to find flaws and optimize processes. No detail is too small for their scrutiny. They are tireless workers, driven by a deep sense of duty and a desire to do a perfect job. They can be excellent managers, though their style is more about leading by example than with grand charisma. Their biggest challenge is paralyzing perfectionism; they can get stuck in the details, losing sight of the bigger picture. They need to learn to delegate and trust that 'good enough' is, in fact, sometimes enough.

Libra.title: Traits of the Libra
Libra.description: Ruled by Venus, Libra is the sign of balance, harmony, and justice. Librans are social beings who thrive on partnership and seek to create equilibrium in all areas of life. They have a keen eye for beauty and a natural diplomatic charm. As a Cardinal Air sign, their mission is to initiate connections and foster peace through mediation and fairness. A Libra's mind is constantly weighing pros and cons, seeking the most balanced perspective, which can lead to notorious indecisiveness. It's not that they don't know what they want, but that they can see the validity in all sides of an argument. This ability makes them excellent diplomats, counselors, and lawyers. Aesthetics are fundamental to their well-being; they are drawn to all things beautiful, whether in art, music, fashion, or people. A cluttered or conflict-ridden environment is physically draining for them. Above all, Libra is the sign of 'we,' not 'me.' They feel most whole when in a partnership, be it romantic, business, or friendship, and they will go to great lengths to maintain peace and harmony in their relationships.
Libra.love: In love, Libra is a hopeless romantic who seeks their other half. Their ultimate goal is a balanced, harmonious, and aesthetically pleasing partnership. They are attentive, diplomatic lovers who are always willing to compromise to keep the peace. Communication and intellectual connection are vital for them. However, their aversion to conflict can be their greatest weakness; they may avoid necessary discussions to maintain an appearance of harmony, which can lead to underlying resentments. They need a partner who appreciates their romantic nature and gently encourages them to express their true needs, even if it means momentarily upsetting the balance.
Libra.friendship: A Libra friend is the mediator, the peacemaker, and the social planner of the group. They are charming, fair, and always seek equity. They enjoy social interactions and are excellent at bringing people together. Their company is pleasant and relaxed, always aiming for consensus. The downside is their legendary indecisiveness; choosing a restaurant can become an hour-long debate. Despite this, their ability to listen and offer balanced advice makes them valuable friends. They will always strive to make sure everyone feels included and happy.
Libra.work: In the workplace, Libra excels in roles that require diplomacy, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. They are great team players, mediators, lawyers, designers, and event planners. They thrive in harmonious and aesthetically pleasing environments and struggle in competitive or conflict-ridden atmospheres. Their ability to see all sides of an issue makes them excellent strategists, though they may take a long time to make a final decision. They are excellent at building networks and maintaining positive professional relationships.

Scorpio.title: Traits of the Scorpio
Scorpio.description: Scorpio is the sign of deep emotion, power, and transformation. Ruled by Pluto (and traditionally Mars), they are passionate, resourceful, and incredibly determined. Scorpios are known for their intensity and their ability to see beneath the surface to the truth of any matter. They live in a world of black and white; for them, there are no gray areas. It's all or nothing. This intensity makes them incredibly loyal and protective of those who earn their trust, but also formidable adversaries if they feel betrayed. They are the detectives of the zodiac, always investigating, questioning, and seeking the hidden motives behind people's actions. Their watery nature gives them deep intuition and an almost psychic connection to the emotional world, both their own and others'. However, they often hide their own feelings under a veneer of calm and control. They fear vulnerability more than anything, and their greatest challenge is learning to trust and let go. Transformation is a central theme in their lives; like the phoenix, a Scorpio is destined to go through multiple 'deaths' and rebirths, emerging from each crisis stronger and wiser than before.
Scorpio.love: Loving a Scorpio is a transformative and intense experience. They don't do things by halves; when they love, they do so with every fiber of their being. They seek a merging of souls, a connection that transcends the physical. Loyalty and trust are the pillars of their romantic universe; a betrayal, no matter how small, is almost unforgivable. They are incredibly passionate and protective, but this intensity can turn into jealousy and possessiveness if they feel insecure. They need a partner who is not afraid of their emotional depth and who is willing to explore the mysteries of life (and the soul) with them. A relationship with a Scorpio is never superficial; it is a journey into the depths of the human heart.
Scorpio.friendship: To gain a Scorpio's friendship is to gain a lifelong ally. They do not have many friends, but those they do have are considered family. They are the keepers of the deepest secrets and the fiercest defenders. A Scorpio friend will always know when something is wrong, even if you say nothing, thanks to their penetrating intuition. They are brutally honest, but their loyalty is unwavering. However, if you betray their trust, be prepared to feel the sting. They do not forgive or forget easily. Their friendship is a sacred pact, a fortress of trust and mutual support.
Scorpio.work: At work, Scorpio is the strategist, the investigator, and the problem-solver par excellence. They have a unique ability to focus intensely on a task, ignoring all distractions until they get to the bottom of the matter. They thrive in roles that require investigation, deep analysis, and handling of confidential information, such as in finance, research, psychology, or surgery. They are ambitious and not afraid of power. Their determination is formidable, and they will stop at nothing to achieve their goals. They can be secretive and prefer to work alone, but when they are part of a team, their loyalty and commitment are total, as long as they respect their colleagues.

Sagittarius.title: Traits of the Sagittarius
Sagittarius.description: The adventurer and philosopher of the zodiac, Sagittarius is ruled by Jupiter, the planet of expansion, luck, and higher knowledge. They are optimistic, freedom-loving, and have an insatiable thirst for knowledge and new experiences. For a Sagittarius, life is a grand adventure, a journey to explore the world and understand its meaning. Their mind is always in search of truth, which makes them eternal students, forever enrolled in the university of life. They possess an infectious sense of humor and a brutal honesty that, while refreshing, can sometimes lack tact. They mean no harm; they simply believe in telling it like it is. Their greatest need is freedom: anything that makes them feel trapped or limited, whether it's a boring routine or a possessive relationship, will have them running for the horizon. They are the visionaries of the zodiac, always looking to the future and believing that the best is yet to come. Their faith in the universe is unwavering, and this optimistic energy often attracts good fortune into their lives.
Sagittarius.love: In love, Sagittarius seeks a partner in adventure, someone who is both their lover and their best friend. They value freedom and independence above all else, so a possessive or jealous partner will send them running. Their approach to romance is optimistic, fun, and philosophical. They love learning alongside their partner, whether it's by traveling to faraway lands or exploring new ideas. They can be wary of commitment, not for a lack of love, but for fear of losing their freedom. They need a companion who understands their need for space and who is willing to grow and explore the world with them.
Sagittarius.friendship: A Sagittarius friend is the one who calls you for a spontaneous road trip or a late-night philosophical debate. They are the life of the party, with an infectious sense of humor and an optimistic outlook on life. Their honesty is legendary; they will always tell you the truth, even if it stings a little. Don't expect them to remember every detail of your life, but they will always be there to encourage you to dream bigger and live more boldly. They are low-maintenance friends who understand and respect others' need for independence.
Sagittarius.work: At work, Sagittarius is the visionary, the teacher, and the explorer. They thrive in roles that allow them to learn, teach, and explore, such as academia, publishing, law, or tourism. They hate routine and micromanagement. They need autonomy and the freedom to follow their curiosity. They are excellent at motivating others with their optimistic vision and their ability to see the big picture. Their challenge is paying attention to details and completing mundane tasks. They work best when they can inspire and delegate the detailed execution.

Capricorn.title: Traits of the Capricorn
Capricorn.description: The ambitious and disciplined goat of the zodiac. Ruled by Saturn, Capricorns are masters of self-control and have the ability to lead the way, make solid and realistic plans, and manage many people who work for them at any time. They are masters of manifestation. They represent structure, tradition, and ambition. For Capricorn, life is a mountain to be climbed, and they are willing to work hard and patiently to reach the summit. Their approach is practical, methodical, and always with a long-term vision. They don't believe in shortcuts; they believe in rules, responsibility, and building solid foundations. Though they may seem serious, distant, or even cold on the outside, they possess a dry wit and a deep sense of loyalty to those who earn their respect. Their greatest fear is failure, and this pressure can make them too hard on themselves and others. Their mission is to learn that true success is not just measured by external achievements but also by the joy and satisfaction found in the journey. They are the rocks of the zodiac, dependable and capable of weathering any storm.
Capricorn.love: In love, Capricorn takes their time. They do not rush into relationships; for them, love is a long-term investment. They show their affection not with flowery words, but with acts of service, loyalty, and unwavering commitment. They seek a partner who is equally ambitious and responsible, and who understands their need for structure. They may seem distant or cool, but beneath their reserved exterior is a loyal heart that longs for a deep and lasting connection. They need a companion who values security and understands that their work is also a form of love and provision.
Capricorn.friendship: A Capricorn friend is the one you call when you need a solid plan or a dose of reality. They won't sugarcoat the truth, but they will always be there to help you build a plan to overcome your problems. They are incredibly dependable and loyal. Their friendships are built slowly, based on mutual respect and trust. They may not be the most expressive friends, but their support is rock-solid. They have a surprising and dry sense of humor that they reserve for their inner circle. They value friends who are equally ambitious and who understand their need for structure.
Capricorn.work: At work, Capricorn is the CEO of the zodiac. They are the embodiment of discipline, responsibility, and ambition. They have a natural talent for management and long-term strategy. They thrive in structured environments where they can climb the ladder of success through hard work and dedication. They are not afraid of responsibility and are excellent at managing both projects and people. Their focus is relentless, and their end goal is always to build something lasting and of high quality. They are the cornerstones of any organization, bringing stability and an unparalleled work ethic.

Aquarius.title: Traits of the Aquarius
Aquarius.description: The visionary and humanitarian of the zodiac. Ruled by Uranus (and traditionally Saturn), Aquarians are original, independent, and forward-thinking. They march to the beat of their own drum and are dedicated to making the world a better place. They are the rebels and the innovators, always questioning the status quo and thinking in terms of 'we' instead of 'me.' Their mind is brilliant, eccentric, and always ahead of its time. They are more comfortable in the world of ideas and concepts than in the messy world of emotions. This can make them seem aloof or detached, but their concern for humanity is genuine and deep. They value friendship above all and treat everyone as equals, with no hierarchies. Their greatest need is freedom: freedom to think, to be different, and to pursue their ideals without restriction. They are the water-bearers, bringing knowledge and new perspectives to quench the collective thirst for progress.
Aquarius.love: In love, an Aquarius seeks a friend and intellectual partner above all. They are attracted to original and unconventional minds. Their approach to romance is more cerebral than emotional. They may seem distant or detached, but their love is genuine, though expressed in a non-traditional way. They value freedom above all else, both for themselves and for their partner. A relationship with an Aquarius must be based on mutual respect, independence, and shared ideals. They need a companion who won't try to curtail their need to socialize with a wide range of people.
Aquarius.friendship: As a friend, an Aquarius is loyal, fair, and always ready to help a cause. They are the friends you can have the weirdest and most fascinating conversations with. They are not possessive and understand the need for space. However, their focus on the collective can sometimes make their friends feel like part of a larger group rather than a special individual. They value friendships based on shared intellectual and humanitarian interests.
Aquarius.work: At work, Aquarius is the innovator, the scientist, and the social reformer. They thrive in roles that allow them to use their brilliant mind to solve problems in unconventional ways. They hate routine and bureaucracy. They need autonomy and the freedom to experiment. They are excellent in fields like technology, science, social work, and activism. They are great team players when working on projects that align with their humanitarian ideals.

Pisces.title: Traits of the Pisces
Pisces.description: The mystic and dreamer of the zodiac. Ruled by Neptune, Pisces are compassionate, artistic, and deeply intuitive. It is the final sign, an amalgamation of all those that came before it. They are connected to the spiritual realm and have a boundless capacity for empathy. Their chameleonic nature allows them to adapt to any environment, absorbing the emotions and atmospheres around them. This sensitivity is both their greatest gift and their biggest challenge. A Pisces lives in a world where the line between reality and fantasy is blurred, which endows them with immense creativity and imagination. They are the old souls of the zodiac, bearers of a wisdom that seems to come from other lifetimes. Their compassion knows no bounds, and they often put the needs of others above their own, which can lead to them being taken advantage of. They often have a deep connection to music, art, and any form of expression that allows them to channel their vast inner world. Escapism is their defense mechanism; when the world becomes too harsh, they retreat into their inner sanctuary of dreams. Learning to set healthy boundaries and to stay grounded in reality without losing their magic is their great life lesson. They are incredibly romantic, not just in love, but in their outlook on life in general, always seeking beauty and spiritual connection in everything.
weaknesses: can be a victim or a martyr
Pisces.love: In love, Pisces seeks a merging of souls, a connection that transcends the mundane. They are hopeless romantics, capable of a level of devotion and self-sacrifice that few can match. They show their love through empathy, compassion, and a desire to heal their partner's wounds. However, their tendency to idealize their partner can lead to disillusionment. They need a partner who is both strong and gentle, someone who can protect their sensitive heart and anchor them to reality without destroying their dreams.
Pisces.friendship: A Pisces friend is a sanctuary for the soul. They are the friends you go to when you need a compassionate ear without judgment. They have an amazing ability to feel what you feel and offer comfort. They are incredibly loyal and selfless. However, their porous nature means they can absorb the negative emotions of others, which can be draining for them. They need friends who respect their need for solitude to recharge and who won't take advantage of their boundless kindness.
Pisces.work: At work, Pisces thrives in environments that allow them to use their creativity, intuition, and compassion. They are excellent artists, musicians, therapists, healers, and non-profit workers. They are not motivated by money or power, but by a desire to contribute to something greater than themselves. Their main challenge is dealing with harsh, competitive work environments. They need a job that has meaning and allows them to use their unique gifts to help others.

Share.lunarPhaseText: Right now, the moon is a {phaseName} in {signName} ({illumination}% illuminated). Check it out on AstroVibes!
